Who is Snigdha

According to my search results, Snigdha is an Indian actress and singer. She began her career as a singer and later became a well-known actress in Tollywood with the film Ala Modalaindi. She has also acted in Tamil and Kannada films.
who is Snigdha Kapuri

According to my search results, Snigdha Kapuri is a Film Director. She has an Instagram account where she describes herself as a Writer-Director, and has shared links to her films, including @holycurse_film and @looklikeyou_film. She also has a presence on Pinterest.
